greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1, a(A206074(n)) = 1 + (2*a(n)), a(A205783(1+n)) = 2*a(n), where A206074 and A205783 give binary codes for polynomials with coefficients 0 or 1 that are irreducible [resp. reducible] over Q.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: If A257000(n) = 1 [when n is one of the terms of A206074] then a(n) = 1 + 2*a(A255574(n)), otherwise a(n) = 2*A260421(A255572(n)).
As a composition of related permutations:
xref: Related permutations: A246201, A246377, A260424, A260426.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 25 2015
